mapper.select: SELECT D.NO, D.WRITER, D.TITLE, D.CONTENT, D.VISITCOUNT, DF.NFILE, DF.OFILE, DATE(D.REGDATE) AS REGDATE FROM DATA D LEFT OUTER JOIN DATA_FILE DF ON D.NO = DF.FILENO WHERE D.NO = #{D.NO}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DATA (WRITER, TITLE, CONTENT, REGDATE, VISITCOUNT) VALUES (#{writer}, #{title}, #{content}, now(), 1)
mapper.update: UPDATE DATA SET writer = #{writer}, title = #{title}, content = #{content}, regdate = now() WHERE NO = #{NO}
